sense.gloss: jeon (fried dish of meat, vegetables, etc. coated in flour and egg)
rice cracker, senbei, Japanese cracker, rice cookie, wafer
green tea, green leaf tea, non-powdered tea (as opposed to matcha)
to boil, to decoct, to infuse
after all, in the end, in short
to extract by boiling, to prepare an infusion of, to decoct

sdata.j: この↑御茶↑↓おちゃ↓は１０↑分間↑↓ふんかん↓↑煎↑↓せん↓じてください。
sdata.e: Let the tea draw for ten minutes.

sdata.j: このお↑茶↑↓ちゃ↓は、１０↑分間↑↓ふんかん↓↑煎↑↓せん↓じなさい。
sdata.e: Let the tea draw for ten minutes.

sdata.j: あらやだ、このお↑煎餅↑↓せんべい↓もう↑湿気↑↓しけ↓ってる。
sdata.e: Yecch. This rice cracker is soggy.

sdata.j: ↑深↑↓ふか↓↑煎↑↓い↓りタンザニア、↑豆↑↓まめ↓のままで↑２００↑↓にひゃく↓グラムお↑願↑↓ねが↓いします。
sdata.e: 200 grams of Tanzania dark roast coffee beans, please.

sdata.j: ↑深↑↓ふか↓↑煎↑↓い↓りの↑濃↑↓こ↓いコーヒーが↑好↑↓す↓きなんだ。
sdata.e: I like my coffee dark and strong.

words.gloss: jeon (fried dish of meat, vegetables, etc. coated in flour and egg)
rice cracker, senbei, Japanese cracker, rice cookie, wafer
